item.title: CSC3050 Tips
item.description: 1_Virtual Machine Setup.pdf http://127.0.0.1:3050/login password: csc3050 You will see a vscode running in your browser openssh server open terminal ssh -p5678 csc3050@127.0.0.1 password: csc3050 Then you will login the machine Transfer files to VM Simply drag files in the vscode… (Use Git or SCP. See the pdf file.)
